descriptionHtml:
[B][size=4][color=#63B8FF]Function DEMO :[/color][/size][/B]

[youtube]DbFURuSUhA4[/youtube] 



[B][size=4][color=#63B8FF]How to use this MOD?[/color][/size][/B]
1. SummonRing can be Crafted, in jewel section.

2. When you craft the ring, system will initialize the companion-setting of the ring.
And the Companion-Setting Spell will add to player.

3. A ring can be linked to 5 companions, and there are five rings.
You can linked to 25 companions totally.

4. This MOD is only avaliable to player\'s companion.

5. The Custom HOME is the location where you choose this option in. 

6. Hmm... To watch the DEMO video...





[B][size=4][color=Red]Note : [/color][/size][/B]
1. Use NMM to install this MOD.

2. Game Version 1.8 or higher.

3. This MOD has 3 launguages : English, Chinese-traditional, Chinese - Simplified
author: Killisgood
